channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead fox found in garden., 29th January
item.description:
The dead fox has been double bagged (as required) in yellow plastic builders’ sacks and moved to the front corner of our drive near pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Spinneys, Bickley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin theft in the area., 29th January
item.description:
If anyone of our lovely neighbours needs a green bin, especially the big ones, can just go on Lambeth and order a new one instead of going around bin shopping and taking it from another neighbour, we have cameras in our building and we would like to have it returned by the end of the week so no one is in trouble. Thanks so much.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montrell Road, Streatham Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
